'''Lynn's Troubles''' is a [[Random World Quest]] that can occur in various places across [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
# Talk to [[Lynn]]
#* She will ask for one of the following:
#** {{Item|Apple|20|x=3}}
#** {{Item|Berry|20|x=2}}
#** {{Item|Carrot|20|x=2}}
#** {{Item|Matsutake|20|x=1}}
#** {{Item|Mushroom|20|x=1}}
#** {{Item|Raw Meat|20|x=1, 3}}
#** {{Item|Snapdragon|20|x=2}}
#** {{Item|Sweet Flower|20|x=1}}
# Collect the ingredients and give them to Lynn
#* The items will automatically be deducted from the player's inventory.

==Rewards==
{{Transclude|Random Event|Rewards}}

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|Something seems to be troubling Lynn...}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Lynn)
:'''Lynn:''' What are you doing here, Traveler?
:'''Lynn:''' I'm out looking for {{Color|buzzword|(Item)}}, but not having much luck so far...
:'''Lynn:''' Could you help me? I only need {{Color|buzzword|(1/2/3) (Item)(s)}}.
:{{DIcon}} Sure!
::'''Lynn:''' Great! I'll keep looking around here in the meantime.
::'''Lynn:''' When you're done, come and see me.
:{{DIcon}} Sorry, I'm too busy.
::'''Lynn:''' Never mind then. I can keep looking, it'll just take me a lot longer...
:;(Cancel quest)

----

;(Talk to Lynn again)
:'''Lynn:''' Found anything yet?
:{{DIcon}} Sure did.
::'''Lynn:''' Let's see... Perfect! This is for you.
:{{DIcon}} I need more time...
::'''Lynn:''' Take all the time you need.
{{Dialogue End}}
